data.name: ThankYou
data.value: Thank you for playing Enchanted Forests Maze. Hope you had fun! See you next time! -Meyli

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value:
Welcome to the game: Enchanted ForestÂ´s Maze!
Once upon a time, there was a beautiful, magical, and safe forest in Sylvaria. But an evil dark entity has cursed this town, turning the forest into a dark and frightening maze filled with traps designed to harm you and prevent your escape.
Your mission is to find the exit (a star shining brightly, waiting for you). However, be careful because on your path, you will not only encounter malicious traps but also need to compete with the other player. Even though both of you will start this adventure, only one will survive.
Not all is doomed because the queen and king are inside the maze and will help whenever you visit them. Oh, I almost forgot! There's an area in this forest unlike the others; the curse has made it invisible. If you land on it, you will be teleported to a random location in the forest, so watch your step.
Without further ado, good luck to you both, and let the games begin!

data.name: EnterMazeSize
data.value: Please enter the size of the maze you would like to play with (note that only numbers starting from 7 are allowed and above 15 the maze maze may print in seperate lines)

data.name: InvalidMazeSize
data.value: Please enter a valid size for the maze (minimum 7):

data.name: AvailableTokens
data.value: These are the citizens trapped in the maze, each one has a distinct ability, speed(number of cells the token can move) and cooldown time (number of turns where the token cant use their ability):

data.name: Player1ChooseToken
data.value: Player 1, please choose your token by entering its number:

data.name: InvalidTokenChoice
data.value: Please enter a valid token number(between 1 and 6):

data.name: Player2ChooseToken
data.value: Player 2, please choose your token by entering its number:

data.name: PlayerChoseToken
data.value: Player {0} chose {1}.

data.name: PlayerTurn
data.value: {0}, its your turn. Your position is {1}.

data.value: {0} is skipping a turn.

data.name: UseAbilityPrompt
data.value: Do you want to use your ability? (Insert 1 for Yes, 0 for No):

data.name: InvalidInputYN
data.value: Invalid input. Please enter 1 for Yes or 0 for No:

data.value: {0} reduced cooldown by 2! Current cooldown: {1}

data.name: SpeedIncreased
data.value: {0} increased speed by 1!

data.name: VictoryMessage
data.value: {0} has reached the shininig star and escaped the maze! Congratulations you survived and won the game!

data.value: Do you want to play again? (Insert 1 for Yes, 0 for No):

data.value: Invalid input. Please enter 1 for Yes or 0 for No:

data.value: No valid moves in that direction. Please try again.

data.value: Trap has already been triggered.

data.name: Trap1Activated
data.value: {0} has fallen into a trap! You will lose a turn trying to put out the fire.

data.value: {0} has fallen into a trap! This hole has sent you to the origin (0, 0).

data.name: Trap3Activated
data.value: {0} has fallen into a trap! You tripped over a log and injured your ankle, so your speed has been reduced to {1}.

data.name: Trap4Activated
data.value: {0} has fallen into a trap! You've encountered the bat of the evil entity, it increases your cooldown time to {1}.

data.value: Position ({0}, {1}) is outside the maze bounds.
